name: $playerElapsedTime
description: Get the elapsed time of a player

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to get the elapsed time for

name: $playerGetVolume
description: Get the volume of a player

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to get the volume for

name: $playerIsPaused
description: Check if a player is paused

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to check the player for

name: $playerLoopStatus
description: Get the current loop mode

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to get the loop mode for

name: $playerPause
description: Pause a player

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to pause the player for

name: $playerReplay
description: Restart the current track from the beginning

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to restart the current track for

name: $playerResume
description: Resume a player

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to resume the player for

name: $playerSeek
description: Seek a player

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to seek the player for

args.name: position
args.description: The position to seek the player to

name: $playerSetVolume
description: Set the volume of a player

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to set the volume for

args.name: volume
args.description: The volume to set for the player

name: $playerShuffle
description: Shuffle a player

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to toggle shuffle for

name: $playerStop
description: Stops playback without destroying the player

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to stop the player for

args.name: clearQueue
args.description: Whether to clear the queue

name: $playerToggleLoop
description: Set repeat mode to off, track, or queue

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to set the loop mode for

args.name: mode
args.description: The loop mode

name: $playerApplyFilters
description: Apply Player filters for lavalink filter sending data, if the filter is enabled / not

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to apply the filters for

name: $playerCheckFilterState
description: Check if a player filter is enabled or not

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to check the filter status for

name: $playerFilterSetEQ
description: Sets the players equalizer band on-top of the existing ones

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to set the equalizer for

args.name: eqBand
args.description: The band to set the equalizer for

args.name: gain
args.description: The gain to set the equalizer for

name: $playerFilters
description: Get the filters of a player

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to get the player filters for

name: $playerFiltersClearEQ
description: Clears the players equalizer bands

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to get the player filters for

name: $playerFiltersSetVolume
description: Set the Filter Volume

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to set the volume for

args.name: volume
args.description: The volume to set

name: $playerIsCustomFilterActive
description: Function to find out if currently there is a custom timescamle etc. filter applied

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to check the filter status for

name: $playerResetFilters
description: Reset the filters of a player

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to reset the filters for

name: $playerSetAudioOutput
description: Set the AudioOutput Filter

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to set the audio output for

args.name: audioOutput
args.description: The audio output to set

name: $playerSetPitch
description: Set custom filter.timescale#pitch . This method disabled both: nightcore & vaporwave. use 1 to reset it to normal

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to set the pitch for

args.name: pitch
args.description: The pitch to set

name: $playerSetRate
description: Set custom filter.timescale#rate . This method disabled both: nightcore & vaporwave. use 1 to reset it to normal

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to set the rate for

args.name: rate
args.description: The rate to set

name: $playerSetSpeed
description: Set custom filter.timescale#speed . This method disabled both: nightcore & vaporwave. use 1 to reset it to normal

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to set the speed for

args.name: speed
args.description: The speed to set

name: $playerToggleKaraoke
description: Enable / Disables a Karaoke like Filter Effect

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to toggle karaoke for

args.name: level
args.description: The level for the karaoke effect

args.name: monoLevel
args.description: The mono level for the karaoke effect

args.name: filterBand
args.description: The filter band for the karaoke effect

args.name: filterWidth
args.description: The filter width for the karaoke effect

name: $playerToggleLowPass
description: Enables / Disables the LowPass effect, (Optional: provide your Own Data)

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to toggle low pass for

args.name: smoothing
args.description: The smoothing value for the low pass effect

name: $playerToggleNightcore
description: Enables / Disables a Nightcore-like filter Effect. Disables/Overrides both: custom and Vaporwave Filter

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to toggle nightcore for

args.name: speed
args.description: The speed for the nightcore effect

args.name: pitch
args.description: The pitch for the nightcore effect

args.name: rate
args.description: The rate for the nightcore effect

name: $playerToggleRotation
description: Enables / Disables the rotation effect

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to toggle rotation for

args.name: rotationHz
args.description: The rotation frequency in Hz

name: $playerToggleTremolo
description: Enables / Disables the Tremolo effect, (Optional: provide your Own Data)

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to toggle tremolo for

args.name: frequency
args.description: The frequency for the tremolo effect

args.name: depth
args.description: The depth for the tremolo effect

name: $playerToggleVaporwave
description: Enables / Disables a Vaporwave-like filter Effect. Disables/Overrides both: custom and nightcore Filter

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to toggle vaporwave for

args.name: speed
args.description: The speed for the vaporwave effect

args.name: pitch
args.description: The pitch for the vaporwave effect

args.name: rate
args.description: The rate for the vaporwave effect

name: $playerToggleVibrato
description: Enables / Disables the Vibrato effect, (Optional: provide your Own Data)

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to toggle vibrato for

args.name: frequency
args.description: The frequency for the vibrato effect

args.name: depth
args.description: The depth for the vibrato effect

name: $playerConnectedVC
description: Get the voice channel ID the player is connected to

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to get the voice channel for

name: $playerCreate
description: Create a player for a guild

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to create the player for

args.name: voiceID
args.description: The ID of the voice channel for the bot to use

args.name: textID
args.description: The ID of the text channel for the bot to use

args.name: volume
args.description: The volume to set the player to

args.name: selfDeaf
args.description: Whether to deafen the bot

args.name: selfMute
args.description: Whether to mute the bot

args.name: node
args.description: The node to use for the player

name: $playerDestroy
description: Destroy a player

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to destroy the player for

args.name: reason
args.description: The reason to destroy the player for

name: $playerExists
description: Check if a player exists

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to check for

name: $playerJoinVC
description: Join a voice channel

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to join the voice channel for

name: $playerMoveVC
description: Move the player to a different voice channel

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to move the player for

args.name: newVoiceChannelId
args.description: The ID of the voice channel to move to

name: $playerReconnect
description: Reconnect the player to its current voice channel

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to reconnect the player for

name: $playerTextID
description: Get the text id of a player

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to get the text id for

name: $playerAddTrack
description: Add a track to a player

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to add the track to

args.name: query
args.description: The query to search for

name: $playerClearQueue
description: Clear the queue of a player

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to clear the queue for

name: $playerNextTrack
description: Get the next upcoming track in the queue

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to get the next track for

name: $playerPreviousExists
description: Check if a previous track exists (ignores current until it ends)

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to check for

name: $playerPreviousTrack
description: Get the last played track from the queue history

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to get the previous track for

name: $playerQueue
description: Get the queue of a player

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to get the queue for

name: $playerQueueHistory
description: Get the queue history of a player

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to get the queue history for

name: $playerQueueLength
description: Get the queue length of a player

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to get the queue length for

name: $playerQueueTime
description: Get the total queue time of a player, optionally excluding specific sources.

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild ID to get the queue time for.

args.name: exclude
args.description: Sources to exclude from the queue time (e.g. "youtube", "soundcloud").

name: $playerRemoveTrack
description: Remove a track from a player

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to remove the track from

args.name: index
args.description: The index of the track to remove

name: $playerShuffleQueue
description: Randomize the order of tracks in the queue

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to shuffle the queue for

name: $playerSkip
description: Skip a track. If position not given skips current track.

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to skip the track for

args.name: position
args.description: The position to skip to

args.name: throwError
args.description: Whether to throw an error if the position is out of bounds

name: $playerSkipExists
description: Check whether the next track exists in the player queue

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to check for

name: $playerSwapTracks
description: Swap the position of two tracks in the queue

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to swap tracks for

args.name: indexA
args.description: First track index

args.name: indexB
args.description: Second track index

name: $playerCurrentLyrics
description: Get the current lyrics of a player

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to get the current lyrics for

name: $playerCurrentTrack
description: Get the current track of a player

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to get the current track for

name: $playerSearchTrack
description: Search for a track

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to search for the track in

args.name: query
args.description: The query to search for

args.name: source
args.description: The source to use. Such as yt for youtube ytm for youtube music etc. Depends on the lavalink server config

args.name: requester
args.description: The requester of the track

args.name: limit
args.description: The limit of the tracks to return

name: $playerTrackDuration
description: Get the duration (ms) of the current track

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to get the track duration for

name: $playerTrackInfoOf
description: Get the info of a track

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to get the track info for

args.name: index
args.description: The index of the track to get the info for

name: $playerTrackRequester
description: Get the user who requested the current track

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to get the requester for

name: $playerTrackThumbnail
description: Get the thumbnail URL of the current track (if available)

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to get the current track thumbnail for

name: $linkedEventPlayerCreate
description: This function is used to get player info on the event linkedPlayerCreate

name: $playerNodeStats
description: Get CPU, memory, and other stats of a Lavalink node

args.name: nodeId
args.description: Optional Lavalink node ID to query stats for

name: $playerPing
description: Get the roundtrip latency between Lavalink and Discord

args.name: guildId
args.description: The guild id to get the player ping for
